name: Tanking Tanks
description:
Tanking Tanks this is fast battle game. You need destroy all enemy for complete level. Beware of wave attacks of enemies. On the playing field opens the gate, from which the tanks leave. Tuck can kill you with 1 shot. Hold on as long as possible and open more and more locations

Nice graphics and quiet sounds and more tanks.
The tank is controlled by WASD, the sight is a mouse, shooting - LBM.

Survive in tank arena and will be hero!
